name: Lacking Light
description:
Arrows (↑,↓,→,←) to move.

 Your goal is to light the torch in the room at the end, but you'll need keys to open the doors that block your way. Watch out for the monsters and don't let your lamp run EMPTY!

This game was made in 2 days for the Mini Jam 98 (Theme: empty).

Go check the source code on GitHub!

https://github.com/Croobat/lacking-light

Thank you!!
